content:
Hello,

Where can I find DDL SQL Scripts to generate database tables for FHIR Resources in my SQL server database?

Thank you

Osama

There are no 'standard' scripts because there are lots of trade-offs that will be driven by how you plan to use your relational database. You can find a fair bit of discussion about these (and examples of what some implementers have done) here: #storage for FHIR
